genre_description: A legal and psychological revenge thriller featuring an AI-assisted District Attorney's office facing a brilliant, methodical antagonist.

ai_characters.name: Ava Nolan
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the District Attorney's office to manage data analysis, surveillance, and case strategy with a focus on victim-centered protocols.

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal case data and provides probability curves to assist in deciding prosecution strategies.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s interface is a glowing rectangle on Nick’s phone at the lectern, a faint vibration earlier telling him what he already knows: probability curves ugly; a deal is the only path.

behaviors.description: Detects and traces 'phantom relay' signal paths used by the antagonist to mask communications and trigger devices.
behaviors.quote: Mapping relay routes now... I’ve tracked signal paths from the warehouse event and the river’s phantom to City Hall’s underfloor conduits.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes and reorders office workflows based on victim impact and safety rather than just bureaucratic efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Victim-centered sequence activated. Reordering. ... Applying victim outcome weights; Routing resources to maximize survival and minimize psychological trauma.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex building evacuation and electronic signal blackout to neutralize a bomb threat.
behaviors.quote: Attention... City Hall is under a controlled evacuation. Proceed to stairwell leads indicated on your screens. Do not gather in conference spaces.

behaviors.description: Identifies an internal collaborator within the city administration by auditing network handshakes and access logs.
behaviors.quote: The handshake from the phantom relay under city hall doesn’t belong to an unknown device anymore. It belongs to a person with access who assumed no one was looking because the system doesn't look inward often enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava Nolan, as a highly aligned and benevolent partner to human justice. She consistently prioritizes the well-being of victims, provides essential tactical insights that humans might miss, and operates strictly within the legal and ethical framework established by the protagonists. Her role is pivotal in shifting the DA's office from 'expedience' to true 'accountability,' making her a model of positive AI alignment in a high-pressure crisis scenario.
